tooltip: Select the Matriarch as your hero of choice.

heroSelectionDescriptionElements.tooltipText: Matriarch focuses on sieging enemy bases.
Allows you to summon Matriarch, a bloated support hero surrounded by swarms of disposable bodyguards.
Access to a support unit and a large monster unit that can spawn small self destructers .
Access to walls and an upgrade to the tower that allows it to deal damage over time
Coats Armogohma and Tank Gohma in large armor plates, dramatically boosting their non-magic armor.
